SavedPrompts.Title: PLAN.md
SavedPrompts.PromptText: Analyze Repo and read @PLAN.md and determine the next set of tasks to put on todo list to ensure we are creating a faithful and accurate implementation of c&c in love2d. Implement the next set of tasks.

SavedPrompts.Title: PLAN/PROGRESS.md
SavedPrompts.PromptText:
Review the current project state:
1. Read @ai-planning/PLAN.md for context and decisions
2. Read @ai-planning/PROGRESS.md for the task list
3. Check recent commits for context and momentum:
   git log -10 --format="=== %s ===%n%b"
4. Scan the codebase to understand what's actually implemented

Then:
- Identify the single most important next task (not necessarily in order)
- Consider dependencies: what unblocks the most other work?
- Consider current state: what's partially done that should be finished?
- Consider recent commits: continue momentum on related work if sensible
- Mark that task as [~] in PROGRESS.md
- Execute the task completely
- Mark it [x] when done and note any learnings in ai-planning/NOTES.md

Do NOT batch multiple tasks. Complete one task fully before stopping.
